name: Enchanted South Seas Kelp
tooltip:
Enchanted South Seas KelpLevel 60

See this here seaweed, mon? It be from the South Seas. We just add a little mojo and a little magic and it takes on the properties most suited to its owner.

You a <class> so it be easy, mon. Just wrap it around your neck and think of nature or squirrels or whatever it be that you people like.
